name: MustHaveMenus
overview:
MustHaveMenus offers restaurants, caterers and others in the food service industry easy, affordable access to professionally-designed menu and promotional flyer designs online. The designs are perfect for everyday use, special events and for holiday promotions. The eye-catching flyers help drive customers to events, parties and festivals. Menus are optimized for hundreds of restaurant themes and styles, from fine dining in every ethnic category to casual bar food, and from event catering to wine lists.

Our integrated software application, the Menu Editor, provides an easy way for food service staff to create professionally-designed menus right on the web. Saving time and hassle, restaurant menus can be created, saved and printed anytime, from anywhere. There is no software to install or maintain. Menus can be reused and easily modified with item or price updates. Multiple copies can be saved for localization within small chains. All menus can be output in PDF format for easy desktop or professional printing.

Becoming a member gives you unlimited access to the thousands of menus, flyers and images in our collection, plus members receive access to helpful marketing tips, promotion strategies and restaurant management resources.
